attributes.review: this game is sick. the moment i downloaded it i was forced to sing the ABC’s until i was vomiting everywhere. they took my cat and forced him to wear sweaters that gave him an allergic reaction. this app ruined my life with its horrible and sick mind games it plays on you from the moment you download it. DONT download this unless you want to go to therapy. it is CRUEL AND UNUSUAL!!
attributes.title: sick and twisted!

attributes.review: the worst app on the entire app store. disgusting. as soon as i opened it, the very sight of the LIE on the sign in page brought insects and cockroaches into my house. the app is false advertisement. they lie to you! america is not great and the orange man in this app will never make it great, nor keep it that way. needs to be taken off of the app store. disgusting scam of an app AND campaign. 🥰✨🧚‍♂️
attributes.title: TERRIBLE.

attributes.review: This app. Is a violation of the boys. The boys have informed me that donald trump is a bad president. I downloaded the app and the second I got on there the app stopped working. So I tried it again and saw this ugly creature on my screen. I think it was the Cheeto tiger guy. When I tried to do anything it made me pay. It overall gets a 1 star.
attributes.title: This app is not for the boys. Sucky app

attributes.review: Ever since I downloaded this app my phone has been glitching like crazy. If the app was open I couldn’t use another app. I also found it pretty difficult to navigate, click, and contact. The app asked me for a bunch of personal information that was not needed. As a whole the app was and IS horrible.
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: This app completely ruined my phone. As soon as the download completed my phone started to freeze and malfunction! I’ve never had this problem before and it only started when I launched this app. Very disappointed and I would not recommend !
attributes.title: Too glitchy!

attributes.review: I got this app in order to gain knowledge on its content but the app kept buffering to open and at times it would completely not open. I also got a virus on my phone from this app it was horrible I had to cleanse my phone and it took a while to do so. I don’t recommend taking this app serious 😔.
attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded this app it glitched my whole phone.😭😭 When I exited out of the app it changed my home screen and lock screen to the orange mans face. 👨🏻🟠 I tried to change it but it just kept going back to his face. I also realized that this app made me turn orange😾!!! I am outraged and do not recommend this app!
attributes.title: 😾mad kitty

attributes.review: I was excited to download this app so I can stay in the loop of what is going on with Trumps campaign, but the app hasn’t been working. It crashes on me every few minutes, and I can’t seem to figure out how to fix that. I tried restarting my phone and it keeps doing it. Very disappointed!
attributes.title: Not good

attributes.review: I seriously tried making it work. It’s been 2 days since downloading and it won’t open consistently, then whenever it dose open it turns my phone black and shuts it off. I deleted it because I am almost positive my phone has a virus now with how slow and glitchy it is. DO NOT DOWNLOAD SAVE YOURSELF THE TROUBLE.
attributes.title: I tried

attributes.review: I just downloaded this app to support our lovely Cheeto puff...but when I downloaded it it nearly blinded me and my family, suddenly I heard voices everywhere saying “VOTE TRUMP VOTE TRUMP” Then I saw trump standing in the corner of my eye I had no choice but to go on survival mode then I used my self defense skills to eat the cheese Cheeto puffs that were his family...mortal of the story DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP OR IT WILL SCAR U FOR LIFE🍊😤😡
attributes.userName: this is the no no square
attributes.title: Worst app ever..🍊
